name: SkateboardMania Enviro-Paint 3000
description:
CONTROLS: WASD or arrow keys = move.

Your skateboard is on fire, and you have to save the forest from burning up. Too bad you're in the forest on a burning skateboard... And as if that wasn't enough, you also have to impress three British art dealers by creating patterns in the forest with your burning skateboard, which will later create a painting for them to watch in their art gallery.

But be careful: The art dealers like extensive art, but they also care a lot for the environment. Good luck!

Made for the One Minute Game Jam #4 (theme: "destroy") in December 2021! (no free assets were used except for the sound effects for fire and "new" trees)

If you create a cool painting in the game, be sure to screenshot it and put it in the comments! I'd love to see what you make! :) /kbrecordzz
